text: Tarzan is an American 3D action adventure movie directed by David Yates and written by Stuart Beattie, Craig Brewer, John Collee, and Adam Cozad. It is based on the fictional character Tarzan created by Edgar Rice Burroughs. The movie stars Alexander Skarsg√•rd, Margot Robbie, Christoph Waltz, and Samuel L. Jackson. It is a remake of the 1984 movie Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes. It was released on July 1, 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * ==Top Billed Cast== * Jack Quaid. Jupiter Ascending / Tarzan. * Samuel L. Jackson. George Washington Williams. * Langley Kirkwood. John Owen. * Mila Kunis. Jupiter Jones. * Mia Owen. Jules Porter Abrasax. * Eddie Redmayne. Balem Abrasax. * David Oyelowo. Robert Katende. * Brett Gelman. Isaac Lachmann. title: The Legend of Tarzan (movie)
